attributes.additional_details:
A motion for the reintroductions of all species that have become extinct in Britain since the end of the last Ice-Age:  Wolf, Brown Bear, Lynx, Elk, Reindeer, European Bison, Wild Boar, Beaver, etc.

The UK. is perhaps the last country in Europe to adopt such measures and it's about time policies changed.  We need fully protected, free roaming areas where these animals can live and breed.
